public class EBM25<U>
extends BM25<U>
Adaptation of an extreme version of the BM25 algorithm, where the k parameter tends to infinity, without term discrimination.

  • Constructor Details

    • EBM25

      public EBM25​(FastGraph<U> graph, EdgeOrientation uSel, EdgeOrientation vSel, EdgeOrientation dlSel, double b)
      Constructor
      Parameters:
      graph - the training graph
      uSel - selection of the neighbours of the target user
      vSel - selection of the neighbours of the candidate user
      dlSel - selection of the neighbours for the document length
      b - tunes the effect of the neighborhood size. Between 0 and 1
